Model.Deck

Class RailYard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Deck.RailYard

  • public class RailYard
extends java.lang.Object
    a class that represents the RailYard field of a player
    Author:
    Nikos Gounakis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RailYard(Player p)
      Constructor :
      Precondition :p must be a valid object and not null
      Postcondition :creates a new RailYard with empty stacks of cards and belongs to player p

      • getCards

        public java.util.Stack<TrainCard> getCards(CardColor color)
                                    throws InvalidMoveException
        Accessor :
        Precondition :color must be one of the colors of the game
        Postcondition :one of the 8 stacks must be returned
        Parameters:
        color - the name of the stack that will be returned
        Returns:
        returns the stack of the 'color' color
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the color is locomotive

      • playCards

        public void playCards(java.util.ArrayList<TrainCard> cards,
                      RailYard oponent)
               throws InvalidMoveException
        Transformer :
        Precondition :player must have chosen some cards to play , oponent's RailYard must be a valid object
        Postcondition :checks if the cards can be trasfered to OnTheTrack and then moves the card to OnTheTrack, uses trainRobbing to check for TrainRobbing
        Parameters:
        cards - the cards that the player has chosen to play
        oponent - the oponent's RailYard
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException - if the player has not chosen cards

      • trainRobbing

        public boolean trainRobbing(java.util.ArrayList<TrainCard> cards,
                            RailYard oponent,
                            CardColor color)
        Observer :
        Precondition :cards must not be empty , oponent's RailYard must be a valid object
        Postcondition :checks for TrainRobbing
        Returns:
        true if TrainRobbing is happening , false otherwise
